thread.section_title: Espressorium Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Espressorium | www.espressorium.com.au
thread.title: Laini

author: Laini
title: Laini
text: I am really impressed with both the quality and the variety of coffee pods available. They even fit the later versions of the Nespresso inissia machine, which work slightly differently which I thought that I would never be able to find alternative pods for. Also, the delivery was prompt, and I like that they are an Australian company :) I would definitely recommend this product and company.
